author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

As far as I can (quickly) tell, these two uses of existsAs() are legitimate. The warnings were noticed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42518#issuecomment-1736985763 .

Resolves https://github.com/makortel/framework/issues/681

#### PR validation:

None (edited on the web editor).
title: Silence static analyzer warning on existsAs() calls in PluginDescription.h
